[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [navigateStacks](./blockly.navigatestacks_1_function.md)

## navigateStacks() function

Returns the next/previous stack relative to the given element's stack.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function navigateStacks(current: ISelectable, delta: number): IFocusableNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  current | [ISelectable](./blockly.iselectable_interface.md) | The element whose stack will be navigated relative to. |
|  delta | number | The difference in index to navigate; positive values navigate to the nth next stack, while negative values navigate to the nth previous stack. |

**Returns:**

[IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md) \| null

The first element in the stack offset by `delta` relative to the current element's stack, or the last element in the stack offset by `delta` relative to the current element's stack when navigating backwards.
